title: [SOLVED]820-3787  - Sensor issues
message:
Hi,

I have a 820-3787 Logic board with numerous sensor issues. Hopefully someone has already cracked this.

CPU Proximity -(TC0P) Reads above the high limit
CPU Die - (TC1C)  Reads above the high limit
CPU B Die 1  (TC2C) Reads above the high limit
CPU B Die 2 (TC3C Reads above the high limit
CPU Core Peci (TCXC) Reads above high limit


I have checked all pullups on the SMBUS, replaced the SMC, and replaced  U5110, just in case GND_SMC_AVSS was the issue.

I also U5870 &U5850 incase these where bad.

Obviously i got some more learning to do.

Help please !!

title: [SOLVED]820-3787  - Sensor issues
message: This seems like a legit measurement as CPU Core Peci is a digital reading from the CPU and has nothing to do with the rest of the sensors. Check CPU temperature and heat sink contact. Maybe bad heat pipe.

title: [SOLVED]820-3787  - Sensor issues
message:
Again Duke you are right. The bad heatpipe never even entered my train of thought.

This is like the 2nd heatpipe I have ever had to replace.

Problem Solved.....
